roleset.name: (cause to) get a stained surface
roleset.note: TARNISH-V NOTES: Member of Vncls entity_specific_modes_being-47.2, entity_specific_cos-45.5 (from tarnish.01-v)

example.name: usually metaphorical
example.text: Provigo's profit record over the past two years tarnished the company's and Mr. Lortie's reputations.
example.arg: Provigo 's profit record over the past two years
the company's and Mr. Lortie's reputations
